entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries before morning. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 12:05 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
